|rad3oui = |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam3 = 4804 |rad3ax = 2402 |acqam3 = |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5.2 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.acwifi.net/13681.html ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX9000'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/12621.html ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX6000'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/9478.html ''Xiaomi Mi Router AX3600'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/xiaomi/xiaomi_ax9000 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/xiaomi/ax9000 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/openwrt-support-for-xiaomi-ax9000/98908 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = qualcommax |subtarget = ipq807x |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Notes== ===Specifications=== 
    SoC – Qualcomm IPQ8072 quad-core Cortex-A53 processor @2.2GHz with 
    dual-core 1.7GHz NPU (network acceleration engine/processing unit)
    System Memory – 1GB RAM
    Connectivity
        Wired
            1x 2.5GbE LAN/WAN port
            1x Gigabit Ethernet LAN/WAN port
            3x Gigabit Ethernet LAN ports
        Wireless
            2.4 GHz WiFi 6 with 4×4 MIMO up to 1148Mbps
            5.2 GHz WiFi 6 with 4×4 MIMO up to 4804Mbps
            5.8 GHz WiFi 6 with 4×4 MIMO up to 2402Mbps
          Antenna – External high-gain antennas + one external AIoT antenna
            Up to 1000 devices connected at the same time on a single router
            Mesh networking with up to 10 routers
    USB – 1x USB 3.0 port
    Misc – 8x LED indicators, Power button, System reset button, 
           Mesh networking button, fan cooling
    Power Supply – 12V/4A power supply
    Dimensions – 408mm x 133 x 177mm
    Temperature Range – Operating: 0 to +40°C; storage: -40 to +70°C
==See also== :;[[List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices]] *[[Xiaomi Mi AX1800]] (MiWiFi M59) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/05/18/most-affordable-wifi-6-router-60-xiaomi-router-ax1800/ Review] *[[Xiaomi Mi AX3600]] (AIoT M60) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/02/14/xiaomi-aiot-router-ax3600-wifi-6-router-sells-for-135/ Review] • [https://www.acwifi.net/9478.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) *[[Xiaomi Mi AX6000]] (AIoT M72) • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/01/13/xiaomi-mi-ax6000-wifi-6-enhanced-router-sells-for-92-in-china/ Review] • [https://www.acwifi.net/12621.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) *[[Xiaomi Mi AX9000]] (AIoT M70) • [https://www.acwifi.net/13681.html ''AC|WiFi''] (CN) [[Category:English Documentation]]
